ee anuwa danata mathdrawya karyan­shaye polis pari­ksha­ka­wa­run dede­nek wana ragama padinchi wima­la­se­nage laya­nal, wali­we­riye padinchi saman wasantha kumara athulu upa­po­lis pari­ksha­ka­wa­run thide­nek wana minu­wa­ngoda udara chathu­ranga, kalu­thara nagoda gayan tharanga, ganthuna wesena athula jayantha samanga sara­ya­nwa­run pasde­nek wana malabe chaminda lakshan, kagalle saman kumara, padukke wimala prasad, mathdrawya karyan­shaye nadu bhanda gaba­dawa barawa siti mahawa dala­da­gama dhanushka, kara­nde­niye wisu wira­sinha yana nila­dha­rin samanga polis kostha­pa­lwa­run ata denek wana atha­dan­gu­wata pathwa siti.

1893di nikola tesla prathama wathawata rahan rahitha sangnya huwamaru krama prayogika bawa penwa duni.guglimo markoni namathi ithali jathika nawa soyaganim karanna prathama wanija kriyakarithwaya athi guwan widuli paniwuda huwamaruwa soyaganna ladi. 1895 di ithaliye ohu prathama sangnya huwamaru kramaya bhawitha kala bawata soya gane.
